CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Solar cells using PffBB-n as a donor material and PC71BM as the acceptor material were fabricated with an inverted device structure of ITO / ZnO / PffBB-n:PC71BM(1 : 2 w / w ) / MoO 3 / Al.

Let's think step by step.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide
2. ZnO: Zinc Oxide
3. PffBB-n: This is likely a specific type of donor material, but without more context, the exact name is not clear.
4. PC71BM: 2,9-Perfluoro-7,7,8,8-tetrahexyl-7,8,9,9-tetrahexylperfluorobutylbenzene-1,4-bis(dithiophene-2-yl)benzene
5. MoO3: Molybdenum Trioxide.

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are: Indium Tin Oxide, Zinc Oxide, PffBB-n (specific donor material), 2,9-Perfluoro-7,7,8,8-tetrahexyl-7,8,9,9-tetrahexylperfluorobutylbenzene-1,4-bis(dithiophene-2-yl)benzene (PC71BM), and Molybdenum Trioxide (MoO3).
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. PffBB-n (specific donor material)
2. PC71BM
3. Zinc Oxide
4. Indium Tin Oxide
5. Molybdenum Trioxide (MoO3)

These are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to Material Names.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PffBB-n (specific donor material) |
| PC71BM |
| Zinc Oxide |
| Indium Tin Oxide |
| Molybdenum Trioxide (MoO3) |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Solar cells using PffBB-n as a donor material and PC71BM as the acceptor material were fabricated with an inverted device structure of ITO / ZnO / PffBB-n:PC71BM(1 : 2 w / w ) / MoO 3 / Al.

Let's think step by step.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide
2. ZnO: Zinc Oxide
3. PffBB-n: Unknown, assuming it's a specific donor material (could be named "PffBB-x" or "PffBB-y" in other contexts)
4. PC71BM: Poly(3-hexylthiophene-2,5-diyl-alt-[6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester)
5. w / w : weight to weight ratio
6. MoO3: Molybdenum Trioxide
7. Al: Aluminum.

So, the Property Names in the paragraph are: ITO, ZnO, PffBB-n, PC71BM, w / w, MoO3, and Al.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

The entities that clearly refer to Material Properties in the paragraph are:

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide
2. ZnO: Zinc Oxide
3. PffBB-n: Unknown donor material
4. PC71BM: Poly(3-hexylthiophene-2,5-diyl-alt-[6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester)
5. MoO3: Molybdenum Trioxide.

So, the Material Properties in the paragraph are: ITO, ZnO, PffBB-n, PC71BM, and MoO3.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Solar cells using PffBB-n as a donor material and PC71BM as the acceptor material were fabricated with an inverted device structure of ITO / ZnO / PffBB-n:PC71BM(1 : 2 w / w ) / MoO 3 / Al.

Let's think step by step.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide - it is a conductive oxide material commonly used as a transparent electrode in solar cells.
2. ZnO: Zinc Oxide - it is a wide-bandgap semiconductor material used as a buffer layer in solar cells.
3. PffBB-n: It is a donor material, but the specific compound is not mentioned in the text, so we cannot identify the exact compound.
4. PC71BM: 6,6-Phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester - it is an acceptor material used in organic solar cells.
5. 1 : 2 w / w : This ratio indicates a weight ratio of 1 part PffBB-n to 2 parts PC71BM.
6. MoO3: Molybdenum Trioxide - it is a thin film oxide material used as a hole transport layer in solar cells.
7. Al: Aluminum - it is a metal used as a back contact in solar cells.

So, the Property Value entities in the paragraph are:

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide
2. ZnO: Zinc Oxide
3. PffBB-n: Unknown donor material
4. PC71BM: 6,6-Phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester
5. 1 : 2 w / w
6. MoO3: Molybdenum Trioxide
7. Al: Aluminum
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. PffBB-n: Unknown donor material (property: material type - donor)
2. PC71BM: 6,6-Phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester (property: material type - acceptor)
3. 1 : 2 w / w (property: weight ratio)
4. MoO3: Molybdenum Trioxide (property: material type - hole transport layer)

So, the relevant Property Value entities in the paragraph are:

1. PffBB-n (property: material type - donor)
2. PC71BM (property: material type - acceptor)
3. 1 : 2 w / w (property: weight ratio)
4. MoO3 (property: material type - hole transport layer)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Unknown donor material (PffBB-n) (material type - donor) |
| 6,6-Phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester (PC71BM) (material type - acceptor) |
| 1 : 2 w / w (weight ratio) |
| Molybdenum Trioxide (MoO3) (material type - hole transport layer) |
